channel.title: Blog on Fiddling with numbers
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Fiddling with numbers

item.title: Pharmacists' Entry-to-practice Milestones
item.description: Congratulations Yuying on publishing a new article. The article looks into relationship between student performance and entry-to-practice milestones. The data set has many common issues commonly encountered in other projects. I am glad that Yuying addressed every research question from the collaborators and presented the results to them in an understandable manner.

item.title: Retinal Image Quality in Diabetic Patients
item.description: Last year, I met with Rahim, Kaleb and Melanie to discuss how to analyze the data about the eyeâ€™s optic. It was an educational moment for me when I found that human vision is different between those with and without diabetes.

item.title: Teachable Conversational Agents
item.description: What a great start to the year! Our paper about teachable conversational agents in crowdwork is accepted to CSCW. Congratulations Nalin! It has been a pleasure to join the team on this long journey.

item.title: Curiostiy Notebook
item.description: Hooray! We submitted the camera-ready version of the paper on Curiosity Notebook for CSCW 2021 to ACM. Congratulations Ken Jen and team. Thank you for letting me participate in such amazing work!

item.title: Humourous Conversational Agent
item.description: Congratulations to Jessy Ceha for her CHI 2021 paper that was awarded Best Paper Honorable Mention. It is wonderful to see an idea blooms after many conversations.
